form.name: complementary_feeding_for_children_9_–__12_months_of_age
form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Feeding A Healthy Child > Complementary Feeding For Children 9 – < 12 MONTHS OF AGE

field.name: Continue breastfeeding your child on demand both day and night, breastmilk continues to be the most important part of your child’s diet
Breastmilk supplies half of the child’s energy needs from 6 – < 12 months of age
Breastfeed first before giving other foods
